languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Обвинения против моей семьи не имеют никакого смысла. Прошу, поговорите с Клеменцией".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость! Обвинения против моей семьи не имеют никакого смысла. Прошу, поговорите с Клеменцией".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Обвинения против моей семьи не имеют никакого смысла. Прошу, поговорите с Клеменцией".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."

languages.text: “大人！这些针对我的家族的指控毫无来由，我恳求您和克莱门缇雅谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."

traits.locale_text: “大人！这些针对我的家族的指控毫无来由，我恳求您和克莱门缇雅谈谈。”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Diese Anschuldigungen gegenüber meine Familie entbehren jeder Grundlage. Ich bitte Euch inständig, mit Clementia zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Diese Anschuldigungen gegenüber meine Familie entbehren jeder Grundlage. Ich bitte Euch inständig, mit Clementia zu sprechen."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Ces accusations qui visent ma famille n'ont aucun sens. Parlez à Clémentia, je vous en conjure. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Ces accusations qui visent ma famille n'ont aucun sens. Parlez à Clémentia, je vous en conjure. »

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Las acusaciones contra mi familia son un sinsentido. Le ruego humildemente que hable con Clementia».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Las acusaciones contra mi familia son un sinsentido. Le ruego humildemente que hable con Clementia».

languages.text: 「陛下！私の家族に対するこのような非難は、納得出来ません。クレメンティアと話すよう、謹んでお願いします」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！私の家族に対するこのような非難は、納得出来ません。クレメンティアと話すよう、謹んでお願いします」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Haneme atılan bu iftiralar akıl alır gibi değil. Rica ederim, Clementia'yla bir konuşun."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! These accusations against my family simply make no sense. I humbly beseech you to speak with Clementia."
